description:
Welcome to the world of despair!
Both sides of your brain are invited to the fun and anguishing challenge.

■ Two characters at once!?
You will move two characters at once, one on each hand.
The challenge will be a piece of cake as long as the two work together!

■ Journey the colorful world with simple controls
Run, jump, and crouch!
Test your skills in the stage filled with gimmicks and puzzles.

■ Beautiful artworks and immersive music
Enjoy delicate and riveting hand-drawn style graphics,
and sentimental soundtracks that bring the world alive.

■ Play with a friend!
Keep the thrill of reckless challenge alone,
or share your joy with friends or family in the co-op mode.
※ Note: Local co-op only. Online play is not supported.
name: Brain Meltdown - Into Despair
intro:
Two characters, two hands, at once!
A unique and peculiar double action for Nintendo Switch™!
